headline.print_headline: BOJ's Kuroda Says Easy Monetary Policy Achieving Intended Results
headline.main: BOJ's Kuroda Says Easy Monetary Policy Achieving Intended Results

lead_paragraph: Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said on Saturday a massive stimulus policy introduced a year ago had achieved its goal of boosting the real economy, lifting growth and ending deflation but said a 2 percent inflation of two years could take more time to achieve.
